name: forge-viewer-utils
description: Wrapper library for Autodesk Forge Viewer providing additional utility functions and documentation.

scripts.build:docs: rm -rf docs/$npm_package_version; jsdoc --configure .jsdoc.json --verbose; mv docs/forge-viewer-utils/$npm_package_version docs/; rm -rf docs/master docs/forge-viewer-utils; cp src/Utilities.js docs/$npm_package_version; cp -R docs/$npm_package_version docs/master

author: Petr Broz <petr.broz@autodesk.com>
